Description: Limestone ostracon with eight and four lines of black-painted hieratic text, a letter addressed to the scribe Karu.
Curator's comments: Römer, M. 2023. Die Ostraka der frühen 18. Dynastie aus Deir el-Bahri und dem Asasif, Bibliothèque Générale 73, Institut français d’archéologie orientale, Cairo.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393922) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393922)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Thomas Garnet Henry James
